title: Problem loading dump into IDA Pro
content:
I am attempting to load a PPC memory dump into IDA Pro, but I am getting a "ROM size overflow" error.  The dump is the exact size of the memory location, but IDA Pro will not load without cutting off bytes.
What seems to be the issue?

answers_data.content:
Looks like a bug in IDA (and probably worth reporting to [emailÂ protected]). Try a ROM size of 
0x3FFFFF
as a workaround.
